Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: beret \beret\ n. a cap made of soft cloth with no brim or bill, widening somewhat outward from a close-fitting headband to a flat top, which often has a button or tab in its center. [WordNet 1.5 +PJC]
beret n : a cap with no brim or bill; made of soft cloth
